text: Yunnanozoon lividum is an extinct species of marine chordate from the Yunnan province, China. It resided in the Cambrian period. about 520 mya ago. == Morphology == The Yunnanozoon resembles a craniate and has a body and pharyngeal teeth. Towards the front are 7 filamentous arches, which were covered by sacs. Towards the back of the body is a gut. The front half contains rods. == Gallery == == References == # "Reinterpretation of Yunnanozoon as the earliest known chordate". Nature. Category:Cambrian Category:Chordates
title: Yunnanozoon
